name: Check For Updates - Colorful Progress Meter
description:
Allows you to change the color of the Check for Updates progress bar

* Thanks to user 552 for the style 1160 idea!

Go to Help/Check for Software Updates, to see this new progress bar

Instructions:
- Change the #HEX Colors in the code to change the look of your custom progress meter

Integrates with Styles:
- Style 8811
- Style 6844


Works on:
- Firefox 3
- Firefox 2

Changelog:
- Initial Release
